title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947),
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Affected Areas) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 120 of
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Affected Areas) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 120 of 

2020) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 5th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [153] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

31 March, 2022. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No.1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947),
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE: 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order revokes the Health Act 1947 (Affected Areas) Order 2020 (SI 120 
of 2020), which designated the State as an area where there is known to be 
sustained human transmission of Covid-19 under section 31B of the Health Act 
1947 as inserted by section 10 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and 
Other Emergency Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [153] 5
